subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Led by the freshman Brandon Knight’s career-high 30 points, Kentucky rallied past West Virginia to become the first team to earn a spot in the Sweet 16.
snippet: Led by the freshman Brandon Knight’s career-high 30 points, Kentucky rallied past West Virginia to become the first team to earn a spot in the Sweet 16.
